MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL30 postcode area of Llandudno affecting properties in Kings Road, Ffordd Dulyn and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10:43am. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers have arrived at the local substation to investigate. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 2:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:00 noon on 9th November 2020
